situation.title: Tests - Sampling
situation.meta_description: Possibility of using a mobile testing team

content.processed:
People who are not able to travel to the testing point themselves can use mobile testing teams. They can be indicated by regional hygienic stations or general practitioners. In this case, the testing team will arrive directly to your home.

If this applies to you, inform the relevant regional hygiene station or your general practitioner.
